name: Midnight Mania
description:
This was made for the 'My First Game Jam' game jam.

You are watching over a sleeping boy. But oh no! Ghosts are coming, to try and give you nightmares. You must kill them off before they reach the boy.

Up and down arrows/WS to move up and down the lanes. Space to shoot. Don't let the ghosts reach the end of the lane. The boy's happiness is your life. Try to get a highscore by killing as many enemies as you can.
